import Mathlib

/-!
  Prove that every bounded convex set in R^n is Jordan measurable.
  This file provides the statement; the proof is omitted (sorry).
-/

open Set

axiom IsJordanMeasurable {n : ‚Ñï} (s : Set (Fin n ‚Üí ‚Ñù)) : Prop

theorem bounded_convex_set_is_jordan_measurable (n : ‚Ñï) (s : Set (Fin n ‚Üí ‚Ñù))
  (hb : Bounded s) (hcvx : Convex ‚Ñù s) : IsJordanMeasurable (s : Set (Fin n ‚Üí ‚Ñù)) := by
  sorry

import Mathlib

/-!
  Statement: every bounded convex set in ‚Ñù^n is Jordan measurable.
  We state the theorem; the proof is omitted (ended with `by sorry`).
  For the purposes of this translation we provide placeholder predicates
  for Bounded, Convex and IsJordanMeasurable.
-/

open Set

/-- Placeholder for Jordan measurability of a subset of ‚Ñù^n. -/
def IsJordanMeasurable (n : ‚Ñï) (s : Set (Fin n ‚Üí ‚Ñù)) : Prop := True

/-- Placeholder for boundedness of a subset of ‚Ñù^n. -/
def Bounded (n : ‚Ñï) (s : Set (Fin n ‚Üí ‚Ñù)) : Prop := True

/-- Placeholder for convexity of a subset of ‚Ñù^n. -/
def Convex (n : ‚Ñï) (s : Set (Fin n ‚Üí ‚Ñù)) : Prop := True

theorem bounded_convex_set_is_jordan_measurable (n : ‚Ñï) (s : Set (Fin n ‚Üí ‚Ñù))
  (hb : Bounded n s) (hcvx : Convex n s) : IsJordanMeasurable n s := by
  sorry

import Mathlib

/-- Placeholder predicate: Jordan measurability for a subset of ‚Ñù^n. -/
def IsJordanMeasurable {n : ‚Ñï} (s : Set (Fin n ‚Üí ‚Ñù)) : Prop := True

/-- Placeholder predicate: boundedness for a subset of ‚Ñù^n. -/
def Bounded {n : ‚Ñï} (s : Set (Fin n ‚Üí ‚Ñù)) : Prop := True

/-- Every bounded convex set in ‚Ñù^n is Jordan measurable. -/
theorem bounded_convex_set_is_jordan_measurable {n : ‚Ñï} (s : Set (Fin n ‚Üí ‚Ñù))
  (hb : Bounded (s : Set (Fin n ‚Üí ‚Ñù))) (hcvx : Convex ‚Ñù s) : IsJordanMeasurable (s : Set (Fin n ‚Üí ‚Ñù)) := by
  sorry
